title: Alessandra Ambrosio and boyfriend Nicolo Oddi look loved-up as they head to a family meal
text:
They've been happily dating for more than a year and their relationship seems to be going from strength to strength.

And Alessandra Ambrosio and boyfriend Nicolo Oddi looked loved-up as they strolled along Sunset Plaza in West Hollywood, before heading to a family meal with her children on Tuesday evening.

The Brazilian model, 38, was beaming from ear-to-ear as her fashion mogul beau wrapped an arm around her waist.

PDA: Alessandra Ambrosio and boyfriend Nicolo Oddi looked loved-up as they strolled along Sunset Plaza in West Hollywood on Tuesday

The former Victoria's Secret Angel went for a laid-back ensemble for the trip and donned a pair of light blue ripped 'mom' jeans.

The mother-of-two teamed her denim with a patterned navy sweater and black trainers with a white sole.

Alessandra left her long brown hair down and used a pair of sunglasses to push back the front of her locks.

The lingerie model went make-up free to display her naturally striking appearance as she stepped out on a low-key outing.

Casual: The Brazilian model, 38, wore a pair of light blue ripped 'mom' jeans, a patterned navy sweater and black trainers for the low-key outing

Alanui founder Jamie looked equally chilled in a pair of black shorts, a T-shirt and trainers.

Later in the day, the couple joined Alessandra's children, Anja Louise, 11, and Noah, seven, for a family meal, with the model posting a video of the huge desserts on offer at the restaurant.

The model has been dating fashion entrepreneur Nicolo for more than a year, since they were first linked back in July 2018.

Alessandra was previously engaged to businessman Jamie Mazur, 38, for 10 years but they split in March last year.

The former couple continue to co-parent children Anja Louise and Noah.

A bite to eat: Later in the day, the couple joined Alessandra's children, Anja Louise, 11, and Noah, seven, for a family meal

The brunette bombshell recently shared the secrets to her approach to beauty in an interview with Vogue magazine.

Alessandra said: 'I feel like in Brazil we have this whole natural thing because we have so many great natural products - it's something that's very important.

'Like I'll drink a lot of coconut water which is super hydrating, and we use coconut oil on the skin, and avocado.

'I try to avoid make-up if I don't have to work because I have to wear so much on jobs. I like bare skin, protected with SPF of course.'
description: The Brazilian model, 38, looked loved-up as they strolled along Sunset Plaza in West Hollywood, before heading to a family meal with her children on Tuesday evening.
